name: Special beef
description: We know what you’re thinking…Subway does breakfast? They sure do! It’s super limited, and not every location does it, but they do offer a nice alternative to those who aren’t feelin’ the typical sausage/bacon, egg, and cheese: a steak, egg, and cheese flat bread.
